Context:
Program Name: Continuing Education ESL Pathway to George Brown College Certificates and Diplomas
Code: R903
Credential: George Brown College Certificate
Method of Study: Part-time
Duration: Must complete the program within three consecutive academic years.
Starting Months: January, May
Location: St. James Campus
Admission Requirements: Completion of this program eliminates the need to write TOEFL, IELTS or George Brown's English Admissions Assessment for any of George Brown's full-time Ontario College Certificate, Diploma or Postgraduate Certificate programs (except for those with a co-op component).
Program Type: Continuing Education ESL Pathway to George Brown College Certificates and Diplomas
Centre: Preparatory & Liberal Studies
School: English as a Second Language ESL

Context:
The George Brown College's Admissions Department recognizes the Continuing Education ESL Pathway program as the English Language requirement for any full-time (without co-op) Ontario College Certificate, Diploma, or Postgraduate Certificate program at George Brown College. This pathway is only valid within George Brown College and does not apply to programs with a co-op component.

The following mandatory courses need to be completed by Con Ed graduates to meet the minimum English language admission requirement:

1. ESL 9068 - ESL IIIB Advanced ($382.00)
2. ESL 9073 - Advanced Grammar and Composition Skills ($316.00)
3. ESL 9069 - Advanced Essay Writing ($316.00)
4. ESL 9078 - Academic Preparation for College/University Studies or ESL 9077 - IELTS Exam Preparation ($284.00)

Graduates of the Continuing Education ESL Pathway to George Brown College Certificates and Diplomas program will be considered and ranked among other applicants for their chosen programs, and they may need to fulfill any other academic requirements specific to those programs (e.g., math, science).

This information is subject to change without notice.
file_path: scraped_pages/programpages2023/Continuing Education ESL Pathway to George Brown College Certificates and Diplomas Program R903 | George Brown College2023.txt

Context:
The Continuing Education ESL Pathway to George Brown College Certificates and Diplomas consists of four mandatory courses. Each course requires the completion of a specific prerequisite course or the equivalent English placement test result before registration. International and domestic students can apply for the program by registering directly in their respective course(s) through the Courses section. International students of R903 program do not need to apply through the George Brown College Online Application System. For more information, contact the School of ESL office at 416-415-5000, ext. 4826 or email conedesl@georgebrown.ca.

The tuition fees for one course in the program starting in Fall 2023 are subject to change for programs starting in Fall 2024 and at later dates. Both domestic and international students pay the same tuition fees. Students should verify the language requirements for their respective course from the Courses section above. The information on this website is subject to change without notice, and students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.

The ESL Pathway program is for continuing education purposes only. To earn credits toward a full-time George Brown program, the English for Academic Purposes program is offered instead.
